title: Apple releases iOS 15.6 beta 1 to developers as iOS 16 announcement looms
content:
After just releasing iOS 15.5 this week, Apple is seeding iOS 15.6 beta 1 to developers. This update is likely the last major iOS 15 version before Apple announces and rolls out iOS 16 in the near future.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple releases iOS 15.6 beta 1 to developers as iOS 16 announcement looms appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After just releasing iOS 15.5 this week, Apple is seeding iOS 15.6 beta 1 to developers alongside watchOS, macOS, and tvOS updates.
